trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: 길이 대 한 값을 열거 <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""> </xref> 음성을 사이입니다.

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Break 강조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 인스턴스에 대 한 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> 에서 반환 된 개체</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> 에서 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> 을 통해 인스턴스에</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 대해 설정 되어

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 각 합성 음성 엔진은; 단어 사이 나누기를 렌더링 하는 방법을 결정 하기 위해 무료 강조의 성격 언어, 언어, 성별 또는 음성 간에 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 두 EmphasisBreak 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>설정 하거나 가져올 때 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>에 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: EmphasisBreak의 실제 값 사용 약관은 모두&0; 보다 작은 팩트 및의 값 두 값을 구분할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>보다 크거나 같으면&0;입니다; 하 고 값을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>속성에는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>는 인스턴스에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>
